Emne:=
 [archive-crawler] RE: Why was total-bandwidth-usage-KB-sec removed from H3=


Hi S=F8ren,

I wasn't involved in the decision, but as I recall the featu=
re was considered somewhat misleading. While it kinda, sorta worked, you co=
uld get immense swings in kb/sec throughput as individual downloads were no=
t metered.

It was thought that those needing overall bandwidth throttling =
would be better served by using a generic product that operated on the rout=
er or firewall level.

- Kris

> Hi all.
> I'm busy migrati=
ng a bunch of Heritrix 1 templates to H3.
> And noticed in the process that=
 the setting "total-bandwidth-usage-KB-sec"
> has been removed from H3.
>
>=
 What was the rationale behind that decision?
>
>
> Best Regards
> S=F8ren =
Vejrup Carlsen, Developer of Netarchivesuite.
